changeSet.author: danicricco=
changeSet.sql: create schema mf_data;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: create schema menu;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: create schema ui;

changeSet.author: mprieto
danicricco
changeSet.sql: insert into sys.acme_launcher(id,name,launch_type,js_amd,url_view) select id,i18n_title,0,js_amd,url_view from sys.acme_modules where js_amd is not null;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update sys.acme_tree_menu set module=id where id in (select id from sys.acme_launcher);

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: insert into sys.acme_views (id,name,js_amd,url_view) select id,name,js_amd,url_view from sys.acme_launchers ;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update sys.acme_launchers set view_id=id;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update sys.acme_views v set js_amd=m.main_module,url_view=m.url from menu.menu_item m where v.id=m.id;

changeSet.author: danicricco
danicricco
changeSet.sql: drop schema menu;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update sys.acme_views set show_menu=true,show_toolbox=false,show_navigator=false;

changeSet.author: danicricco
danicricco
changeSet.sql: update sys.acme_views set show_toolbox=true where "name"='web.home.admin.projects';

changeSet.author: mprieto
mprieto
changeSet.sql: update applications.applications set initial_setup_ready = false;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ui.multiselect_conf(id, service_name) VALUES ('users', 'multiselect.users');

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
haquino
changeSet.sql: update projects.projects set lock_version = 0 where lock_version is null; update forms.forms set lock_version = 0 where lock_version is null;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
mprieto
changeSet.sql: create schema actions;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ui.multiselect_conf(id, service_name) VALUES ('usersNotInGroup', 'multiselect.usersNotInGroup');

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ui.multiselect_conf(id, service_name) VALUES ('groupsNotContainingUser', 'multiselect.groupsNotContainingUser');

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ui.multiselect_conf(id, service_name) VALUES ('rolesNotContainingEntity', 'multiselect.rolesNotContainingEntity');

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: UPDATE forms.forms SET root_id=id;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW forms.forms_last_version_view AS select f.root_id as root_id, max(f.version) as max_version from forms.forms f group by f.root_id;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW forms.forms_last_version_published_view AS SELECT f.root_id, max(f.version) AS max_version FROM forms.forms f GROUP BY f.root_id,f.published HAVING f.published=true;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
rodrigovz
haquino
changeSet.sql: UPDATE forms.element_prototypes SET root_id = null, version = 1;

changeSet.author: haquino
changeSet.sql: CREATE VIEW forms.element_prototypes_last_version_view AS select ep.root_id as root_id, max(ep.version) as max_version from forms.element_prototypes ep group by ep.root_id;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW forms.forms_was_published_view AS SELECT distinct (f.root_id) FROM forms.forms f GROUP BY f.root_id, f.was_published HAVING f.was_published = true;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
mprieto
mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE applications.application_users SET status = 0;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: create schema pools; ALTER TABLE forms.pools SET SCHEMA pools;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE forms.element_prototypes SET instantiability = 0;

changeSet.author: rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: ALTER SEQUENCE forms.seq_pools SET SCHEMA pools;

changeSet.author: mprieto
danicricco
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE core.authorizations DROP CONSTRAINT authorizations_pkey CASCADE; update core.authorizations set name=id where name is null;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: delete from core.roles; INSERT INTO core.roles( id, application_id, editable, active, created, deleted, modified, available) select a.id,a.application_id,a.editable,a.active,a.created,a.deleted,a.modified,true from core.authorizations a where dtype='Role';

changeSet.author: danicricco
danicricco
changeSet.sql: update core.authorizable_entities_authorizations d set authorization_name= (select name from core.authorizations where id=d.authorization_id);

changeSet.author: danicricco
rodrigovz
changeSet.sql: create schema reports;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: drop schema if exists actions cascade;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE forms.element_instances SET xml_id = 'element' || id

changeSet.author: mprieto
mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE forms.forms SET provide_location=false;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE forms.pages SET instance_id = 'page' || id

changeSet.author: mprieto
danicricco
changeSet.sql: update forms.element_prototypes set default_language='en';

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update forms.pages set default_language='en';

changeSet.author: mprieto
mprieto
changeSet.sql: create schema documents

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM documents.uploads

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: drop sequence documents.seq_uploads; drop schema documents;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update core.authorizations set visible=true;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mf_data.uploads SET new_document_id = document_id || '';

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE core.users SET system_administrator = false;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ui.multiselect_conf(id, service_name) VALUES ('applications', 'multiselect.applications');

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE core.users SET system_administrator=true WHERE mail='root@mobileforms.sodep.com.py'

changeSet.author: mprieto
danicricco
changeSet.sql: update mf_data.lookuptables set owner_id=1 ;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update mf_data.lookuptables set identifier=id;

changeSet.author: danicricco
changeSet.sql: update mf_data.lookuptables t set name=(select value from mf_data.lookuptables_labels l where l.language=t.default_language and t.id=l.lookup_table_id );

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: delete from core.users_devices; delete from core.devices;

changeSet.author: mprieto
changeSet.sql: delete from core.users_devices; delete from core.devices;

changeSet.author: amiranda
amiranda
mprieto
changeSet.sql: UPDATE mf_data.uploads SET bypass_uniqueness_check = false;

changeSet.author: mprieto
mprieto
mprieto
afeltes
changeSet.sql: insert into sys.parameters(id, active, deleted, description, label, type, value) select 1024, true, false, 'Installation id (incremented every time liquibase is run) ', 'SYS_DEPLOY', 0, '0' where not exists ( select * from sys.parameters where id = 1024);

changeSet.author: rvillalba
changeSet.sql: UPDATE log.logins SET login_type_value = 'UNKNOWN';

changeSet.author: vrumich
changeSet.sql: create schema workflow;
